item.description:
I don't mean young goats either. More like Bouldering with children, and perhaps a few top rope climbs. Join my 10yo son and me for climbing at MetroRock because it's always more fun to climb with others. Afterwards, we'll grab lunch or order Pizza in.

Rates: A <7yo day pass is $10

A Student day or Bouldering only pass is $15

Shoe rental is $5

Top rope harness is $3

See MetroRock site for more information.

I'll send out my number Friday night. If you have any questions please post or message me.

See you then... Douglas
item.name: Climbing with Kids
